data.description: Rebless objects to new namespace root
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The proposed modules recurses into a hierarchical data structure,
    reblessing blessed objects that it finds into a new sub-namespace.

    This is useful, for example, if you use Parse::RecDescent's
    autotree directive to construct an object tree for you, but you
    don't like how all those objects are blessed into classes off the
    main namespace (say, a mail parser will produce header::, body:: and
    so on). You will then use Class::Rebless to rebase all those objects
    into your project (say, Mail::header, Mail::body).

    I'm considering both Class::Rebless and Object::Rebless, and am
    leaning towards the former. Please comment if you think something
    else is appropriate. Thanks!
